1.0.name: wordpress/twitter-likebox-lightbox-promoter
1.0.description:
This plugin has been deprecated and won't be maintained anymore. In the future this plugin might be resurected with a better code base. Twitter is a great way to grow your websites traffic. With this plugin you can display an lightbox with a twitter likebox. The result? More twitter followers.

Features

  • Display the lighthox on pages,on post and/or on your homepage
  • Set a delay for the lightbox to show
  • Grow you twitter follower base
  • More exposure by the friends of your new followers
  • Ability to show the lightbox once every x days (per visitor)

Requirement

  • PHP5
  • Valid Doctype in your theme (usually the case)
